summary: The purpose of this mod is to make Omluag, a worker from Markarth, look younger and better.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#cccccc]Greetings, fellow Skyrim lovers![/color] 

[/size][size=3]I have made this mod to offer you an improved version of Omluag, who works at the Markarth smelter. 

[/size][b][size=4][color=#ffff00]Why?[/color]

[/size][/b][size=3]First of all, I thought it would be nice to improve the looks of another male character elligible for marriage. He originally has a wrinkly face but a nice peronality. He is working hard at the smelter and seems to be a kind person, so why not make him look good? ;)

[/size][size=4][color=#ffff00]What's new about Omluag?[/color]

[/size][size=3]I have removed the wrinkles from his face, changed his hairstyle and his face just a bit.[/size]

[size=4][color=#ffff00]What other mods have you used?
[/color]
[/size][size=3]First of all, I have used the latest Skyrim update. Secondly, the Apachii hair mod is a must!!! Otherwise, it is most likely that this mod isn't going to work.
Here is a link to Apachii's mod I have used: [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000112412][size=3][b][u][color=#00ff00]ApachiiSkyHair_v_1_5_Full[/color][/u]
[/b][/size][/url][size=3]I have also used[/size] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1000024200][size=3][b][u][color=#00ff00]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi - Variant - 2_0a[/color]
[/u][/b][/size][/url][size=3]Plus this[/size] [u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/download/1385][color=#00ff00][size=3][b]High Quality Eyes by Xenius[/b][/size][/color][/url]

[/u][size=4][color=#ffff00]Are there any problems I should think about?[/color]

[/size][font=Georgia][size=3]As far as I know, you shouldn't have any problems with it. If you find any problems leave me a message or a comment on this mod.[/size]

[/font][size=4][color=#ff0000]Also check this out:[/color] [/size]

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61222/?][u]Farkas and Vilkas Redon[/u][/url][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61222/?]e[/url][/u][/size]
[size=4][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60761/?]Summon undead - Conjure Skeleton Spell[/url][/u]
[/size][u][color=#f6b26b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60433/?][size=4]Beautiful Onmund[/size]
[/url][/color][/u][font=Trebuchet MS][size=4][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60677/?]Younger looking Sorex Vinius
[/url][/u][/size][/font][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68146/?][u][size=4]BLMM - Better Looking Marriageable Men[/size][/u][/url]

[color=#d5a6bd][size=5]Enjoy your Omluag! ☺

[/size][/color][i][size=3]jodidovahkiin[/size][/i]
author: jodidovahkiin
